description: Removal of (Condition 4) of approved planning permission 1290/17. (Summary)
decision_conditions:
1) The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than 14 May 2020.
2) The development hereby permitted shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the following approved plans: 16303_PL01, 16303_PL05A, 16303_PL06A, 16303_PL07A and 16303_PL08A.
3) Before occupation, the dwelling shall comply with Building Regulations Optional Requirement Approved Document M4 (2) Category 2: Accessible and adaptable dwellings (2015 edition) and evidence of compliance shall be notified to the building control body appointed for the development in the appropriate Full Plans Application, or Building Notice, or Initial Notice to enable the building control body to check compliance.
4) Before occupation the dwelling shall comply with Building Regulations Optional Requirement Approved Document G2 â€“ Water efficiency (2015 edition). Evidence of compliance shall be notified to the building control body appointed for the development in the appropriate Full Plans Application, or Building Notice, or Initial Notice to enable the building control body to check compliance.
5) Prior to first occupation of the development hereby approved, details of refuse and recycling storage facilities and secure and undercover cycle parking shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. They shall be provided at the site prior to first occupation of the development and shall be retained at the site thereafter in accordance with the approved drawings at all times.
6) Building, engineering or other operations such as demolition, works preparatory to or ancillary to the construction shall take place only between the hours of 8:00 and 18:00 Mondays to Fridays and between the hours of 8:00 and 13:00 on Saturdays and no works shall be carried out at any times on Sundays or Public Holidays. This condition shall apply unless alternative arrangements are agreed (in advance of relevant works) in writing by the London Borough of Redbridge under section 61 of the Control of Pollution Act 1974.
